subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo’s goal with about 20 minutes left gave Real Madrid a 3-2 aggregate lead over Manchester United, securing Real’s passage to the Champions League quarterfinals.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo’s goal with about 20 minutes left gave Real Madrid a 3-2 aggregate lead over Manchester United, securing Real’s passage to the Champions League quarterfinals.
